title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: After pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, an error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: After pressing the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, the JAR should be created successfully without any error messages.
SR: To reproduce the bug: 1. Open a file, make some changes to it, but do not save it. 2. Open the JAR packager for the associated project. 3. Enter the required paths, destination, name, and description in the JAR packager. 4. Press the 'Finish' button to create the JAR.
